description.oldValue:
,Organizational messages for selected people experience categories in Adoption Score will enable IT admins to help users understand how to get more from Microsoft 365 using targeted in-product notifications. We will be releasing new organizational messages for Communication and Content Collaboration experiences, backed by Microsoft's commitment to user level privacy.
GA date: June CY2023
Preview date: November CY2022
description.newValue: ,Organizational messages for selected people experience categories in Adoption Score will enable IT admins to help users understand how to get more from Microsoft 365 using targeted in-product notifications. We will be releasing new organizational messages for Communication and Content Collaboration experiences, backed by Microsoft's commitment to user level privacy.
